column1: #Text=" Katara says : " Maybe you 're not as good as you think you are .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I bet it 's because I changed sides .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know .
#Text=Maybe your firebending comes from rage and you just do n't have enough anger to fuel it the way you used to .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sooo , all we need to do is make Zuko angry .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Okay , cut it out !
#Text=Look , even if you 're right , I do n't want to rely on hate and anger anymore .
#Text=" Toph says : " You 're gon na need to learn to draw your firebending from a different source .
#Text=" Sokka says : " How 's he supposed to do that ?
#Text=Zuko needs to go back to whatever the original source of firebending is .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , is it jumping into a volcano ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I do n't know .
#Text=For earthbending , the original benders were badgermoles .
